column1: Gléowine composed an immortalizing song about [[Théoden]] and his ancestors after the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]]. It was said that he never composed another song afterwards. Sadly, only the last stanza survived:<ref>{{RK
Out of doubt, out of dark, to the day's rising
he rode singing in the sun, sword unsheathing.
Hope he rekindled, and in hope he ended;
over death, over dread, over doom lifted
out of loss, out of life, unto long glory.
:Gléowine is a major character in the Lord of the Rings Online. He was [[Horn (Man of Rohan)
column2: Horn]]'s mentor. He is first encountered being banished from Edoras at the command of [[Gríma
column3: Gríma Wormtongue]], and later accompanies the player and his old apprentice on their journeys in the Riddermark.
